movies.description: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

movies.title: The Adventures Of Ichabod And Mr. Toad
movies.director: James Algar, Clyde Geronimi, Jack Kinney
movies.description: An animated adaptation of 'The Wind in the Willows' followed by an adaptation of 'The Legend of Sleepy Hollow'.

movies.title: Airplane!
movies.director: David Zucker, Jim Abrahams, Jerry Zucker
movies.description: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane full of passengers.

movies.title: All That Jazz
movies.description: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

movies.title: An American In Paris
movies.description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

movies.title: American Psycho
movies.description: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

movies.title: An American Werewolf In London
movies.description: American college students David Kessler and Jack Goodman on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists. Jack dies. David recovers in a hospital, where he has nightmares.

movies.title: Anchors Aweigh
movies.description: A pair of sailors on leave try to help a movie extra become a singing star.

movies.title: Annie Get Your Gun
movies.description: The story of the great sharpshooter Annie Oakley, who rose to fame while dealing with her love/professional rival, Frank Butler.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
movies.description: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become 'real' so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

movies.title: Badlands
movies.description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.

movies.title: Barry Lyndon
movies.description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, the Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

movies.title: Battle Royale
movies.description: In a dystopian future, a group of students from a Japanese high school are forced by the governemnt to compete in a battle, killing one another until only one is left standing.

movies.title: Beau Is Afraid
movies.description: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic odyssey back home.

movies.title: Beauty and the Beast
movies.description: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

movies.title: Beauty and the Beast
movies.description: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

movies.title: Beetlejuice
movies.description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

movies.title: Best In Show
movies.description: A behind-the-scenes look into the highly competitive and cut-throat world of dog shows through the eyes of a group of ruthless dog owners.

movies.title: Bicycle Thieves
movies.description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

movies.title: The Birdcage
movies.description: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing, conservative parents

movies.title: Black Narcissus
movies.description: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

movies.title: Blood Simple
movies.description: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies, and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

movies.title: Blow Out
movies.description: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

movies.title: Blue Moon
movies.description: In 1943 lyricist Lorenz Hart confronts his shattered self-confidence in a bar as his former collaborator, Richard Rodgers, celebrates the opening night of his groundbreaking hit musical "Oklahoma!"

movies.title: Brazil
movies.description: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

movies.title: Breathless
movies.description: A small-time crook, hunted by the authorities for a car theft and the murder of a police officer, attempts to persuade a hip American journalism student to run away with him to Italy.

movies.title: Broadcast News
movies.description: A high-strung news producer finds herself in a love triangle between a talented but self-doubting reporter and a charming new anchor, who embodies the growing trivialization of news that she is determined to fight against.

movies.title: Bugonia
movies.description: Two conspiracy-obsessed young men kidnap the high-powered CEO of a major company, convinced that she is an alien intent on destroying planet Earth.

movies.title: Burning
movies.description: Jong-su bumps into a girl who used to live in the same neighborhood, who asks him to look after her cat while she's on a trip to Africa. When back, she introduces Ben, a mysterious guy she met there, who confesses his secret hobby.

movies.title: Cabaret
movies.description: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

movies.title: Cat Ballou
movies.description: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

movies.title: Challengers
movies.description: Tashi, a former tennis prodigy turned coach, transformed her husband into a champion. But to overcome a recent losing streak and redeem himself, he'll need to face off against his former best friend and Tashi's ex-boyfriend.

movies.title: Charade
movies.description: Romance and intrigue ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want to get their hands on a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. She soon loses trust in those who claim they want to help her.

movies.title: Cinderella
movies.director: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske
movies.description: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

movies.title: Cinema Paradiso
movies.description: Salvatore, a famous film director, returns to his hometown for the funeral of the local theater's film projectionist, Alfredo. He reminisces about his life as a young boy falling in love with cinema.

movies.title: Citizen Kane
movies.description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

movies.title: Original Cast Album: Company
movies.description: 'Company' musical's original cast recording session filmed by D.A. Pennebaker in 1970. Captures interactions between Sondheim, performers and live recording process, culminating with Elaine Stritch's iconic 'The Ladies Who Lunch' rendition

movies.title: The Conversation
movies.description: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

movies.title: Dangerous Liaisons
movies.description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

movies.title: Darkman
movies.description: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

movies.title: Deliverance
movies.description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

movies.title: Dial M For Murder
movies.description: A London playboy plots the perfect murder of his rich, unfaithful wife.

movies.title: Die My Love
movies.description: Grace, a writer and young mother, is slowly slipping into madness. Locked away in an old house in and around Montana, we see her acting increasingly agitated and erratic, leaving her companion, Jackson, increasingly worried and helpless.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

movies.title: Do The Right Thing
movies.description: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

movies.title: Edward Scissorhands
movies.description: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.

movies.title: Enter The Dragon
movies.description: A Shaolin monk travels to an island fortress to spy on an opium lord - who is also a former monk from his temple - under the guise of attending a martial arts tournament.

movies.title: Escape From Alcatraz
movies.description: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possibly successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

movies.title: The Evil Dead
movies.description: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

movies.title: Evil Dead II
movies.description: Ash Williams, the lone survivor of an earlier onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits, holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

movies.title: Army Of Darkness
movies.subtitle: Evil Dead Part 3
movies.description: When Ash Williams is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead in order to return home.

movies.title: Event Horizon
movies.description: A rescue crew is tasked with investigating the mysterious reappearance of a spaceship that had been lost for seven years.

movies.title: Excalibur
movies.description: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

movies.title: The Exorcist
movies.description: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

movies.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
movies.description: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

movies.title: The Fly
movies.description: A botched experiment transmutes a man into a monstrous insect.

movies.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
movies.description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

movies.title: Frankenstein
movies.description: Dr. Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist, brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.

movies.title: Friendship
movies.description: A suburban dad falls hard for his charismatic new neighbor.

movies.title: The Gate
movies.description: Kids left home alone accidentally unleash a horde of malevolent demons from a mysterious hole in their suburban backyard.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Grease
movies.description: Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

movies.title: Hearts of Darkness
movies.subtitle: A Filmmakers Apocalypse
movies.director: Eleanor Coppola, Fax Bahr, George Hickenlooper
movies.description: Documentary that chronicles how Francis Ford Coppola's Apocalypse Now (1979) was plagued by extraordinary script, shooting, budget, and casting problems - nearly destroying the life and career of the celebrated director.

movies.title: Highest 2 Lowest
movies.description: When a titan music mogul is targeted with a ransom plot, he is jammed up in a life-or-death moral dilemma.

movies.title: Hot Dog...The Movie
movies.description: Harkin Banks heads to skiing championships in California. A teen runaway tags along as he parties and competes with friends and foes.

movies.title: If I Had Legs I'd Kick You
movies.description: While trying to manage her own life and career, a woman on the verge of a breakdown must cope with her daughter's illness, an absent husband, a missing person, and an unusual relationship with her therapist.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

movies.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
movies.description: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

movies.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
movies.description: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, replicating the city's residents one body at a time.

movies.title: The Island Of Dr. Moreau
movies.description: A shipwrecked survivor discovers a remote island owned by a crazed scientist who is carrying out sinister experiments on the island's inhabitants.

movies.title: It Was Just an Accident
movies.description: An unassuming mechanic is reminded of his time in an Iranian prison when he encounters a man he suspects to be his sadistic jailhouse captor. Panicked, he rounds up a few of his fellow ex-prisoners to confirm the man's identity.

movies.title: It's A Wonderful Life
movies.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

movies.title: Jaws
movies.description: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to the local police chief, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

movies.title: Jay Kelly
movies.description: Famous movie star Jay Kelly and his devoted manager, Ron, embark on an unexpectedly profound journey through Europe. Along the way, both men confront the choices they've made, relationships with loved ones, and the legacies they'll leave behind

movies.title: Killers Of The Flower Moon
movies.description: When oil is discovered in 1920s Oklahoma under Osage Nation land, the Osage people are murdered one by one - until the FBI steps in to unravel the mystery.

movies.title: King Kong
movies.description: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.

movies.title: Kramer vs. Kramer
movies.description: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

movies.title: La Haine
movies.description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

movies.title: Late Night With The Devil
movies.description: A live television broadcast in 1977 goes horribly wrong, unleashing evil into the nation's living rooms.

movies.title: Lawrence Of Arabia
movies.description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

movies.title: The Life And Death of Colonel Blimp
movies.description: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

movies.title: The Lost Boys
movies.description: When a recently divorced mother and her two teenage boys move to a coastal town to stay with her father, it doesn't take long for the brothers to realize the area is a haven for something much more sinister than party-going surfers.

movies.title: Mad Max
movies.description: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

movies.title: The Road Warrior (Mad Max 2)
movies.description: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community get rid of a horde of bandits.

movies.title: Mad Max: Beyond Thunderdome
movies.description: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post-apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper and a drifter named Max.

movies.title: Furiosa
movies.subtitle: A Mad Max Saga
movies.description: After being snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, while the tyrants Dementus and Immortan Joe fight for power and control, the young Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.

movies.title: Malcolm X
movies.description: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his eventual assassination.

movies.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
movies.description: An American doctor and his wife, a former singing star, witness a murder while vacationing in Morocco, and are drawn into a twisting plot of international intrigue when their young son is kidnapped.

movies.title: The Mastermind
movies.description: In 1970, failed architect James Blaine Mooney and cohorts wander into a museum in broad daylight and steal four paintings. When holding onto the art proves more difficult than stealing them, Mooney is relegated to a life on the run.

movies.title: Mean Streets
movies.description: In New York City's Little Italy, a devoutly Catholic mobster must reconcile his desire for power, his feelings for his epileptic girlfriend, and his devotion to his troublesome friend.

movies.title: Megalopolis
movies.description: The city of New Rome faces the duel between Cesar Catilina, a brilliant artist in favor of a Utopian future, and the greedy mayor Franklyn Cicero. Between them is Julia Cicero, with her loyalty divided between her father and her beloved.

movies.title: Metropolis
movies.description: A beautiful and cultured Utopia exists above a bleak underworld populated by mistreated workers. When the privileged youth Freder discovers the grim scene under the highly stylized futuristic city, he becomes intent on helping the workers.

movies.title: Mickey 17
movies.description: During a human expedition to colonize space, Mickey 17, a so-called "expendable" employee, is sent to explore an ice planet.

movies.title: A Mighty Wind
movies.description: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

movies.title: Misery
movies.description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

movies.title: Mo' Better Blues
movies.description: Jazz trumpeter Bleek Gilliam makes questionable decisions in his professional and romantic lives.

movies.title: Modern Romance
movies.description: Albert Brooks directs himself as a successful film editor with far too many issues that affects the relationship between him and his remarkably patient girlfriend.

movies.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
movies.description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

movies.title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
movies.description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

movies.title: Mr. Smith Goes To Washington
movies.description: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

movies.title: My Fair Lady
movies.description: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make a crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

movies.title: The Naked Gun
movies.subtitle: From The Files of Police Squad!
movies.description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

movies.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2
movies.subtitle: The Smell of Fear
movies.description: Lieutenant Frank Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

movies.title: The New World
movies.description: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

movies.title: New York, New York
movies.description: An egotistical saxophonist and a young lounge singer meet on VJ Day and embark upon a strained and rocky romance, even as their careers begin a long, uphill climb.

movies.title: New York Stories
movies.director: Martin Scorsese, Woody Allen, Francis Ford Coppola
movies.description: A middle-aged artist obsessed with his pretty young assistant, a precocious 12-year-old living in a hotel, and a neurotic lawyer with a possessive mother make up three Gotham tales.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies.title: Noah
movies.description: Noah is chosen by God to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.

movies.title: Nope
movies.description: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling phenomenon.

movies.title: North by Northwest
movies.description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

movies.title: The Northman
movies.description: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.

movies.title: Nosferatu
movies.description: A gothic tale of obsession between a haunted young woman and the terrifying vampire infatuated with her, causing untold horror in its wake.

movies.title: Nouvelle Vague
movies.description: After writing for Cahiers du cinéma, young Godard decides making films is the best film criticism. He gets Beauregard to fund a low-budget feature, creating a treatment with Truffaut about a gangster couple.

movies.title: One Battle After Another
movies.description: When their evil enemy resurfaces after 16 years, a group of ex-revolutionaries reunite to rescue the daughter of one of their own.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: A dramatization of the life story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who had a large hand in the development of the atomic bombs that brought an end to World War II.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.description: In 1944 Spain, a girl is sent to live with her ruthless stepfather. During the night, she meets a fairy who takes her to an old faun. He tells her she's a princess, but must prove her royalty by surviving three gruesome tasks.

movies.title: Paths Of Glory
movies.description: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

movies.title: Pearl
movies.description: In 1918, a young woman on the brink of madness pursues stardom in a desperate attempt to escape the drudgery, isolation, and lovelessness of life on her parents' farm.

movies.title: Peeping Tom
movies.description: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

movies.title: Pirates of The Caribbean: The Curse of The Black Pearl
movies.description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate 'Captain' Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

movies.title: Pirates of The Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
movies.description: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

movies.title: Pirates of The Caribbean: At World's End
movies.description: Will Turner, Elizabeth Swann, Hector Barbossa, and the crew of the Black Pearl try and rescue Jack from davy jones locker and prepare to fight Lord Cutler Beckett, who controls Davy Jones and the Flying Dutchman.

movies.title: The Picture Of Dorian Gray
movies.description: Londoner Dorian Gray stays young, but his portrait ages.

movies.title: Purple Rain
movies.description: A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

movies.title: Raging Bull
movies.description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

movies.title: RAN
movies.description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.title: Rocky
movies.description: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

movies.title: Rocky II
movies.description: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

movies.title: Rocky III
movies.description: Rocky faces the ultimate challenge from a powerful new contender, and must turn to a former rival to help regain his throne as the undisputed fighting champion.

movies.title: Rocky IV
movies.description: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-six, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

movies.title: Rope
movies.description: Two men try to convince themselves they've committed the perfect murder by hosting a dinner party after strangling a former classmate to death.

movies.title: The Running Man
movies.description: A man joins a game show in which contestants, allowed to flee anywhere in the world, are pursued by "hunters" hired to kill them.

movies.title: Scanners
movies.description: A scientist trains a man with an advanced telepathic ability called "scanning" to stop a dangerous Scanner with extraordinary psychic powers from waging war against non-Scanners.

movies.title: Seven Samurai
movies.description: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, and he gathers six other samurai to join him.

movies.title: The Seventh Seal
movies.description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.title: Sinners
movies.description: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

movies.title: Ski School
movies.description: Rival groups in a skiing school do battle on and off the piste. One gang are rich and serious, the other group are party animals.

movies.title: The Smashing Machine
movies.description: The story of mixed-martial arts and UFC champion, Mark Kerr.

movies.title: The Sound Of Music
movies.description: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

movies.title: Spartacus
movies.description: The slave Spartacus survives brutal training as a gladiator and leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic, as the ambitious Crassus seeks to gain power by crushing the uprising.

movies.title: Steve Jobs
movies.description: Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.

movies.title: Sunset BLVD.
movies.description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

movies.title: Superman
movies.description: Superman must reconcile his alien Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as reporter Clark Kent. As the embodiment of truth, justice and the human way he soon finds himself in a world that views these as old-fashioned.

movies.title: Suspicion
movies.description: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

movies.title: Sweeney Todd
movies.subtitle: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
movies.description: The legendary tale of a barber who returns from wrongful imprisonment to 1840s London, bent on revenge for the rape and death of his wife, and resumes his trade while forming a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.

movies.title: Tampopo
movies.description: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

movies.title: Thelma & Louise
movies.description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two women escape for the crimes they committed.

movies.title: Time Bandits
movies.description: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: Together
movies.description: Years into their relationship, Tim and Millie find themselves at a crossroads as they move to the country. With tensions already flaring, an encounter with an unnatural force threatens to corrupt their lives, their love and their flesh.

movies.title: The Tragedy Of Macbeth
movies.description: A Scottish lord becomes convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland, and his ambitious wife supports him in his plans of seizing power.

movies.title: True Romance
movies.description: In Detroit, a pop-culture enthusiast steals cocaine from his new wife's pimp and tries to sell it in Hollywood, prompting the mobsters who own the drugs to pursue the couple.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.description: An insurance salesman begins to suspect that his whole life is actually some sort of reality TV show.

movies.title: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
movies.description: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in a grueling and inhumane dance marathon.

movies.title: To Kill A Mockingbird
movies.description: A widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama defends a black man against a false rape charge while teaching his young children about the sad reality of prejudice.

movies.title: Touch Of Evil
movies.description: A Mexican official and his American wife are targeted in a Texas border town by the crime family he's trying to put behind bars for drug trafficking, as his concern grows over the tactics of the local detective whose cooperation he needs.

movies.title: Videodrome
movies.description: A Toronto cable TV station co-owner who specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast titled "Videodrome."

movies.title: Waiting for Guffman
movies.description: An aspiring director and the marginally talented amateur cast of a hokey small-town Missouri musical production go overboard when they learn that someone from Broadway will be in attendance.

movies.title: Wake Up Dead Man
movies.subtitle: A Knives Out Mystery
movies.description: Benoit Blanc returns for his most dangerous case yet.

movies.title: Walk Hard
movies.subtitle: The Dewey Cox Story
movies.description: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

movies.title: Wallace & Gromit
movies.subtitle: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
movies.description: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

movies.title: Weapons
movies.description: When all but one child from the same class mysteriously vanish on the same night at exactly the same time, a community is left questioning who or what is behind their disappearance.

movies.title: The Wiz
movies.description: When Harlem schoolteacher Dorothy is miraculously whisked away to an urban fantasy land called Oz, she goes in search of the Wiz, a wizard who can help her get back to Manhattan, along with the Scarecrow, the Tin Man and the Cowardly Lion.

movies.title: X
movies.description: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in a rural Texas farm, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the crew find themselves fighting for their lives.

movies.title: Xanadu
movies.description: A struggling artist living in Los Angeles meets a girl who may hold the key to his happiness.
